name: Nature Faith
description: A religion that venerates the forces of nature, viewing the natural world as sacred and interconnected.

rituals.name: Spring Festival
rituals.description: A celebration of growth and renewal held during the spring equinox.

rituals.name: Rain Dance
rituals.description: A ritual performed to invoke rainfall during dry seasons.

tenets.name: Harmony with Nature
tenets.description: Live in balance with the natural world and avoid unnecessary harm.

tenets.name: Reverence for Life
tenets.description: All living things have intrinsic value and must be treated with respect.

name: Ancestor Worship
description: A religion that emphasizes reverence for ancestors, believing they offer guidance and protection.

rituals.name: Ancestor Feast
rituals.description: A communal gathering to honor and celebrate the spirits of ancestors.

rituals.name: Shrine Maintenance
rituals.description: Regular upkeep of family shrines to maintain a connection with the ancestors.

tenets.name: Honor the Past
tenets.description: Respect and remember the deeds of those who came before.

tenets.name: Preserve Tradition
tenets.description: Follow the customs and practices handed down through generations.

name: Monotheistic Faith
description: A religion centered on the worship of a single all-powerful deity, emphasizing moral conduct and devotion.

rituals.name: Daily Prayer
rituals.description: Devotees pray daily at specific times to connect with the deity.

rituals.name: Holy Day Observance
rituals.description: Special ceremonies held on days of religious significance.

tenets.name: Faithfulness
tenets.description: Maintain unwavering devotion to the deity.

tenets.name: Charity
tenets.description: Help those in need as an expression of divine will.
